title: IDIS Demonstrates the Power of ‘One Solution, One Company’ at ASIS 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 8:15 AM   Idis 
ANAHEIM, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Surveillance powerhouse IDIS placed its innovative total video surveillance solution front and center at ASIS 2015. This Smart News Release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150929006350/en/ IDIS showcases its total video surveillance solution at ASIS 2015 (Photo: Business Wire) 
Alongside the company’s groundbreaking DirectIP™ surveillance technology, IDIS highlighted the fruits of its industry-responsive R&D/engineering focus, including the world’s highest performing NVR, the 360-degree Fisheye Camera with unrivalled dewarping and digital zoom technology, and DirectCX™, a comprehensive HD over coaxial cable offering. 
The IDIS DirectIP™ range of cameras, monitors, NVRs, and accessories leverage a revolutionary NVR-based approach to bring greater simplicity, performance, and affordability together as never before. DirectIP™ was presented alongside IDIS Solution Suite™ (ISS), a highly scalable and flexible VMS that works across all recording platforms in a modular manner that delivers customized feature sets at an affordable price point. IDIS DirectCX™, a high definition surveillance solution for coaxial cable installations, supporting HD-TVI 2.0, offers the opportunity for those with existing coaxial cabling to leverage signature IDIS quality and performance. 
Several offerings featured on-stand reflected the IDIS’s industry leading innovation: 
• the world’s highest performing 4K NVR, the IDIS DR-6316P-S, with a class-leading network throughput up to 310Mbps (including significantly enhanced image quality on remote clients), leading-edge 4K video out capability, and support for H.265, which allows saving of up to 50% of storage space; and 
• the IDIS 5MP 360-degree Fisheye Camera, with unparalleled dual camera- and client-side dewarping technology (including mobile client dewarping), effortlessly smooth e-PTZ, auto-pan functions, and support for varied image layouts, with 256 independent views. 
A true end-to-end, single-source surveillance offering, the IDIS total solution is uniquely flexible and modular. IDIS technology is easily scaled and configured for maximum cost-effectiveness in meeting all surveillance needs. 
IDIS also shared details of new Partner and Training and Certification programs, noting that the introduction of these programs represents the meeting of major milestones in the growth and expansion of the IDIS America brand-business, first launched five months ago at ISC West. 
Noted Keith Drummond, Senior Director of US Sales, “We are very excited to be here at ASIS for the first time, and to have the chance to show visitors how the comprehensive IDIS total solution—fully designed, developed, and manufactured in house—delivers unprecedented ease of installation and use, bringing down total cost of ownership significantly.” 
Learn more about IDIS at ASIS 2015 at www.idisgobal.com/gamechanger . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150929006350/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
